about

I am a third-year PhD student in computational linguistics at Uppsala University (ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡ª), supervised by Joakim Nivre and Anders SÃ¸gaard. My research revolves around syntactic parsers and language models: how we can use the former to understand the latter (and vice versa). Before my PhD, I graduated from the EM-LCT program, where I spent my first year at the University of Groningen (ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡±) and my second year at the the University of the Basque Country (ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸). I grew up in Western Massachusetts (ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸).
